Package semsim.fileaccessors

Class ModelAccessor

java.lang.Object
semsim.fileaccessors.ModelAccessor
Direct Known Subclasses:
JSimProjectAccessor, OMEXAccessor
public class ModelAccessor
extends java.lang.Object
A class for accessing the contents of a model, whether stored in a standalone file, within an archive, or online
Author:
mneal

      Copy constructor
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • getFilePath

      public java.lang.String getFilePath()
      Returns:
      The path to the file containing the model

    • getFullPathToModel

      public java.lang.String getFullPathToModel()
      Returns:
      The path to the model file. If the model is in an archive or a JSim project file, the path takes the form [path to archive/.proj file]#[name of model]. Otherwise, this returns the same path as getFilePath().

    • getFileThatContainsModelAsURI

      public java.net.URI getFileThatContainsModelAsURI()
      Returns:
      The archive URI if the model is part of an archive, or returns the standalone URI if the model is in a standalone file.

    • getDirectoryPath

      public java.lang.String getDirectoryPath()
      Returns:
      Get the parent directory of the file containing the model

    • isLocalFile

      public boolean isLocalFile()
      Returns:
      Whether the model is stored locally

    • getFile

      public java.io.File getFile()
      Returns:
      The File containing the model

    • modelIsOnline

      public boolean modelIsOnline()
      Returns:
      Whether the model is online or not

    • existingModel

      public boolean existingModel()
      Returns:
      Whether the file containing the model exists locally

    • getModelAsString

      public java.lang.String getModelAsString() throws java.io.IOException
      Returns:
      The model as a String
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • modelInStream

      public java.io.InputStream modelInStream() throws java.io.IOException
      Returns:
      The model text as an InputStream (only for locally-stored models)
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • writetoFile

      public void writetoFile​(SemSimModel model)
      Write out a SemSimModel to the ModelAccessor's file location
      Parameters:
      model - The SemSimModel to write out

    • getFileName

      public java.lang.String getFileName()
      Returns:
      The name of the file that contains the model

    • getJDOMDocument

      public org.jdom.Document getJDOMDocument()
      Returns:
      A JDOM Document object read in from a modeling file

    • getShortLocation

      public java.lang.String getShortLocation()
      Returns:
      A truncated path to the model

    • getModelType

      public ModelClassifier.ModelType getModelType()
      Returns:
      The type of model that the ModelAccessor accesses

    • sharesDirectory

      public boolean sharesDirectory​(java.lang.String name)
      Parameters:
      name - The name of a file
      Returns:
      Whether a file with the input name is contained within the same directory as the model that the ModelAccessor accesses

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(ModelAccessor ma)
      Parameters:
      ma - A ModelAccessor
      Returns:
      Whether this ModelAccessor is equivalent to the input ModelAccessor

    • getModelName

      public java.lang.String getModelName()
      Returns:
      The name of the model being accessed by this ModelAccessor

    • createRDFreaderForModel

      public AbstractRDFreader createRDFreaderForModel​(SemSimModel thesemsimmodel, java.lang.String curationalrdf, SemSimLibrary sslib) throws java.util.zip.ZipException, java.io.IOException, org.jdom.JDOMException
      Create an appropriate AbstractRDFreader to read in RDF-based annotations for a model
      Parameters:
      thesemsimmodel - The SemSimModel to be annotated
      curationalrdf - Existing RDF-based curational metadata for the model
      sslib - A SemSimLibrary instance
      Returns:
      An appropriate AbstractRDFreader to read in RDF-based annotations for a model
      Throws:
      java.util.zip.ZipException
      java.io.IOException
      org.jdom.JDOMException
